attributes.description:
Backed by Toyota
Extended warranty available 
All vehicles subject to a checklist
All vehicles guaranteed not stolen
Guaranteed year model
We value our guests dearly and take pride in our service levels. 
Roadworthy inspection completed. Automark inspection done. Please call us today for a test drive and see it for yourself. Trade-ins welcome. Come and deal with one of our friendly and professional sales executives and experience true Toyota Witbank hospitality!  Finance is available. Price excludes service and delivery fees.  At Barloworld we take huge pride in our guest service levels and as a proud member of the Toyota family we take what we do very seriously. 
Backed by Toyota.
